name: Ten Seconds (thejames12112)
description:
You have just 10 seconds to complete each level, so hurry up!

The theme came from a game jam that I was unable to participate in Thinking it was an interesting concept I decided to give it a go anyway. 

Controls

  • Movement: WASD or Arrow keys
  • Jump: Spacebar

Coming soon

  • Levels 10 - 15: Ice World
  • Levels 16 - 20: Desert World
